reviewDescription: Great starters kit. Everyone included to get started. Easy to follow instructions, minimal assistance needed for child under 8 years. But they get so much pride in what they are able to make.

reviewTitle: Great way to teach cross stitch to kids!
reviewDescription: We are so happy with this product! I love to cross-stitch and my 9-year-old daughter wants to learn. There are 7 projects that are scaffolded in a way to teach the skills sequentially. The patterns are clear with pre-punched holes for the thread to go through. My daughter keeps asking when we can do the next project. Highly recommend!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2026

reviewDescription: My 8 year old loved it and it keeps her occupied for hours making gifts for her friends and our family. The projects are very easy and quick to make.

reviewDescription: Arrived on time and looks like what was pictured. It is a Christmas gift.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2025

reviewDescription: I bought the Cross Stitch Kits for Kids hoping to keep my kids busy for at least the length of a cup of coffee, and honestly, this kit deserves a medal. The colors are so bright and cheerful they made me want to stitch something, and my kids actually sat down quietly to craft. QUIETLY. They loved making the little butterfly and flower keyrings, and now everything in the house has a new “decorative charm” attached—backpacks, door handles, their beds. It’s a fun, easy craft that makes them feel super accomplished, and I love that it keeps them busy doing something creative instead of asking for snacks every five minutes or endless screen time. This is a great value I purchased two other sets.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2025

reviewTitle: Perfect for my craft loving daughter
reviewDescription: We were very impressed with this kit! Perfect for beginners, and so many fun projects. The larger needles, the prepared fabrics with holes already in them, and the needle threader are exactly what a young person trying out cross stitch for the first time needs. Such a well thought out product. My daughter is loving all the beautiful things she is creating. Highly recommend this kit to anyone considering it. That may sound cheesy, but it’s true! We will be trying more of their kits soon.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2025

reviewDescription: My 6 year old loves these. This is her second sewing kit. This one is more advanced. Requires some adult help because the criss cross is a little tricky for her. Great for gifts

reviewTitle: Great, but a little challenging for a perfectionist
reviewDescription: I gave this to my 8 year old granddaughter. She loved it, but being a perfectionist, it was challenging. Eventually (after her tears, & adult positivity & patience) she got it & it all worked out on the end, and she was proud to show off her handiwork.

reviewDescription: I’m cross stitching a Christmas stocking for our new baby. My 6 year old daughter wants to do what I do. I bought her another child’s cross stitch that she couldn’t do because threading the needle was too sharp and hard, making the small crosses was too hard. It was very frustrating. So I found this kit. It has been WONDERFUL. She can use the plastic needle without hurting herself. She can thread the needle and she can make the crosses beautifully using the pre pressed holes. The only trouble she has is tying the not on the end of the thread. She’s already created one and a half of the key rings and has enjoyed the craft completely. Thank you for this fun child-friendly kit!!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023

reviewTitle: Super Cute Cross Stitch kit for young beginners
reviewDescription: My 8 year old was easily able to learn how to do basic cross stitch with this kit. The illustrated instructions are easy to understand. You can make 4 floral & butterfly patterns on felt. The felt is firm and has pre-punched holes.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023

reviewTitle: This kit goes from very easy to pretty hard.
reviewDescription: My 9 year old picked up the basic crossstitch pretty fast. Counting the stitches was more difficult. It’s a great kit for beginners. Would suggest for 9-12 year olds.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023

reviewTitle: Fun and Excellent Motor Skills Tool
reviewDescription: I bought this for my 5 year old boy and we worked on it last night. It is a good challenge for him and was a lot of fun creating something. He had to use his thinking and motor skills for it. We worked on the unicorn pillow and the bunny key chain. First thing he said this morning was that he wanted to cross stitch! I'd say that is a win. It reminds me of working on a cross stitch picture when I was very young.
